If serial incorrect

Enter serial directly into the registry: 

Go to your start button, go to RUN, type in regedit select ok 

H_KEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\ahead\Installation\Families\Nero 7\Info 

Right Click on the Info folder Select (New>String Value) 

Right click on new string and Paste Serial From Keygen (same U Gonna Use For Nero Install)

Good Luck!

Sorry!

If serial incorrect 

Enter serial directly into the registry: 

Go to your start button, go to RUN, type in regedit select ok 

H_KEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\ahead\Installation\Families\Nero 7\Info 

Right Click on Serial* and Paste Serial From Keygen (same U Gonna Use For Nero Installation)
FYI, Nero installer will ask you to install Ask Toolbar which is AdTool.Win32.MyWebSearch adware. Do NOT install it. Google it if you don't believe me.
EDIT: My scanner found the adware when the executable, Nero 7.8.5.0 Ultra.exe started to unpack files, not before.

Dude, this is Digitally Signed by "Nero AG," so it is impossible for me to have edited it.  You can just download the Nero from http://www.nero.com/ then, if you don't trust me.  You'll find that they're exactly the same.
